name: Quobject Quiz Package
summary: Learn about .QUIZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QUIZ files contain both questions and answers. Therefore, they can be used for creating exams as well as answer sheets.

description: Package of .QUOX files created for Quobject Explorer, a program used for preparing quizzes and exams; stores the archive using .ZIP compression and saves the QUOX files in the order they appear on the exam.
